import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const InstructorDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { // Redirect to login if not authenticated if (localStorage.getItem("isLoggedIn") !== "true") { navigate("/login"); } }, [navigate]); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("isLoggedIn"); navigate("/login"); }; const instructor = { name: "T. Janny", role: "Instructor", courses: 2, learners: 2, completionRate: "80%", trainingTime: "15h", }; const courses = [ { name: "Web Development Basics", students: 10, progress: "75%", }, { name: "Advanced UI/UX Design", students: 8, progress: "60%", }, ]; return (
